summary: Identified critical structural discrepancy: CanonicalFrame does not instantiate TaskFrame. The representation theorem proves satisfiability in an ad-hoc structure that doesn't match the semantic model definition. Recommended approach: create SyntacticCanonicalFrame : TaskFrame Int using MCS worlds with a transitive-closure-based task relation.
